pr_title: Define lifecycle tasks for running different types of packaging tests

timeline.message: Define lifecycle tasks for running different types of packaging tests

timeline.bodyText: When would this not be present? Shouldn't that be an error?
timeline.author: rjernst

replies.bodyText: Yeah, you're right. I had initially anticipated something like the integ test zip type, but we aren't testing that here. And if we do add a type we would probably want this to explode rather than silently ignore. I've removed the optional wrapper here.
replies.author: mark-vieira

timeline.bodyText: We've used . as the separator in the rest of the tasks in this plugin. Can we reuse that here? It is easier when typing out the task name to not need to add quotes as # requires.
timeline.author: rjernst
